title: Adventure has wings
creator_credit: Royal Society for the Protection of Birds and Anthony Clay
brief_description: Shows the variety of birds in Britain in different situations as seen by two town children, two country children, and their friends. How the RSPB’s Young Ornithologist’s Club makes birdwatching more enjoyable more adventurous. Designed for showing to children aged 9-13 years to increase their interest in birds and birdwatching.
